entities.name: THE COMPANY
entities.description: The organization that grants an award under the Plan to individuals who may be Consultants, Directors, or Employees of the Service Recipient, the Company, or one of its other Affiliates throughout the world.

entities.name: SERVICE RECIPIENT
entities.description: An affiliate of the Company that receives services from Consultants, Directors, or Employees.

entities.name: COMISIÓN NACIONAL DEL MERCADO DE VALORES
entities.description: The Spanish regulatory body for securities markets.

entities.name: DIRECCIÓN GENERAL DE COMERCIO E INVERSIONES
entities.description: The Spanish Directorate General for Trade and Investments, where the acquisition and subsequent sales of shares of Common Stock must be declared for statistical purposes.

entities.name: BANK OF SPAIN
entities.description: The national central bank of Spain, where securities accounts held abroad may need to be declared electronically.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company grants awards to individuals who may be Consultants, Directors, or Employees of the Service Recipient.

relationships.target_entity: COMISIÓN NACIONAL DEL MERCADO DE VALORES
relationships.relationship_description: The Company’s Agreement and shares of Common Stock are not registered with the Comisión Nacional del Mercado de Valores.

relationships.target_entity: DIRECCIÓN GENERAL DE COMERCIO E INVERSIONES
relationships.relationship_description: The acquisition and subsequent sales of shares of Common Stock under the Company’s Plan must be declared to the Dirección General de Comercio e Inversiones.
Securities accounts held abroad related to the Company’s Plan may need to be declared electronically to the Bank of Spain.
